param.name: aam_jump
param.description: In SSO setup, Managed server monitor Edit monitor option from admin server

param.name: editPage
param.description: In SSO setup, Managed server monitor Edit monitor option from admin server

regex.name: am.credManager.monTypes
regex.value: ^(RESTAPISequence|TELNET|SNMP v1v2|SNMP v3|SSH|Powershell|WMI|GlassFish|JBOSS-server|Jetty Server|.Net:9080|Resin|RESTAPIMonitor|Tomcat-server|VMware vFabric tc Server|WEBLOGIC:7001|WebSphere-server|ApacheGeronimo|JDK1.5:1099|AS400DB2|Cassandra|Couchbase|DB2:50000|HBase|Informix|MongoDB|MSSQLDB:1433|MYSQLDB:3306|OracleNoSQL|ORACLE-DB-server|PostgreSQL|SapHana|MaxDB|Neo4j|SQLAnywhere-DB-server|SYBASE-DB-server|SYBASE-Replication-server|Microsoft MQ|OfficeSharePointServer|BizTalkServer|RabbitMQ|LyncServer|Kafka|ApacheActiveMQ|OracleEBS|SAP|Microsoft Dynamics CRM|MSDynamicsAX|SAPBusinessOne|OpenStack|Exchange-server|APACHE:80|ApacheSolr|ElasticSearchCluster|OPMMonitor|HAProxy|NginxPlus|UrlMonitor|Coherence|Hazelcast|ApacheSparkMaster|ActiveDirectory|NetworkPolicyServer|LDAP Server|MAIL-server|FTPMonitor|Nutanix|CiscoUCS|Docker|XenApp|OracleVM|Hyper-V-Server|XenServerHost|CitrixVirtualAppsAndDesktop|VMWare ESX/ESXi|all|Telnet|JBoss Server|Microsoft .NET|WebLogic Server|WebSphere Server|Apache Server|Tomcat Server|Java Runtime|DB2|MS SQL|MySQL|Oracle|Sybase|Microsoft MQ \(MSMQ\)|MS Office SharePoint|IBMHTTPServer|OracleHTTPServer|DamengDB|SAPASJava)$

regex.name: manageTableRow
regex.value: ^(((?i)None)|Retain Row|Delete Row|Unmanage Row and Reset Status|retain|delete|unmanage)$

regex.name: am.perfpoll.scriptmon.excepetion.msg.value
regex.value: ^(Login Exception|Invalid Passphrase|ConnectException|Unable to get Session|Timed out|Max connections \(per Device\) Reached|System Wide Max Connections Reached|Exit code|Expected output Error)$

regex.name: am.cli.settings.monitortype
regex.value: ^(AIX|Ceph Storage|Default|File System Monitor|FreeBSD / OpenBSD|HP-UX / Tru64|Istio|Kubernetes|KVM|Linux|Mac OS|OpenShift|Script Monitors|SiebelEnterpriseServer|Sun Solaris)$
